name: 2019 The 4th International Conference on Manufacturing, Material and Metallurgical Engineering (ICMMME 2019)--EI Compendex, Scopus
content: Accepted and registered full papers will be published into IOP Conference Series: Materials Science and Engineering(ISSN: 1757-899X), which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS) & Inspec, etc. \*Submission: By Email: icmmme\_conf@163.com By online submission system: https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icmmme2019
